JOB DESCRIPTION: SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test) Essential Skills:   Understands the concepts of the Test Driven Design or Behavior Driven Design with In Sprint Automation guidelines.  Hands -on experience with understanding and updating Gherkin on Cucumber (Given/ When/ Then)  Ability to read/ comprehend automated scripting languages (e.g. Java,  Ruby,  etc.)  Experience in testing SOAP /  REST services.  Priority on SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test) type of role with below skills as mandatory  Hands on experience with Integration testing especially using Unit test frameworks (XCTestFramework Swift supporting Library).
